about_the_game:
This Season Pass covers all planned DLC packs planned for Automobilista 2 over 2020 & 2022 - includes at least 6 Premium Race Tracks with multiple versions, 3 Expansion Packs with several cars and tracks along with other smaller packages still to be announced.

This includes:

  • Hockenheim Pack featuring 1975, 1988, 2001, 2020 versions (individually this will sell for US$ 9.99 /€8.99)​ - RELEASED IN JULY 2020
  • Silverstone Pack featuring 1975, 1991, 2001, 2020 versions (individually this will sell for US$ 9.99 / €8.99)​ - RELEASED IN AUGUST 2020
  • Nurburgring Pack featuring GP, Nordschleife & 24h layouts (individually this will sell for US$ 9.99 / €8.99)​ - RELEASED IN OCTOBER 2020
  • Spa-Francorchamps Pack featuring 1970, 1993, 2020 versions (individually this will sell for US$ 9.99 / €8.99)​ - RELEASED IN DECEMBER 2020
  • At least two more Track DLCs in the same mould of the ones above ( US$ 9.99 / €8.99 each)​

Furthermore, this Season Pass covers all Expansion Packs and other Car & Track packages to be released in the 2020-2022 timeframe - these are packs currently confirmed, arranged to a certain theme, featuring cars, tracks or both, with base prices ranging from US$ 9.99 - US$ 19.99:

  • Brazilian Grand Prix Legends - Pack featuring several World Championship cars won by Brazilian drivers
  • Historical Track Pack - Pack featuring historical variants of tracks featuring in the game
  • Street Supercars - Pack of road-legal Supercars
  • Racin´ USA - Pack featuring several North American cars and tracks, modern and historical
  • Adrenaline - Pack featuring several off-road & Extreme Motorsports cars and tracks

This Season Pass covers all planned DLC packs planned for Automobilista 2 over 2020 & 2022 - includes at least 6 Premium Race Tracks with multiple versions, 3 Expansion Packs with several cars and tracks along with other smaller packages still to be announced.

This includes:

  • Hockenheim Pack featuring 1975, 1988, 2001, 2020 versions (individually this will sell for US$ 9.99 /€8.99)​ - RELEASED IN JULY 2020
  • Silverstone Pack featuring 1975, 1991, 2001, 2020 versions (individually this will sell for US$ 9.99 / €8.99)​ - RELEASED IN AUGUST 2020
  • Nurburgring Pack featuring GP, Nordschleife & 24h layouts (individually this will sell for US$ 9.99 / €8.99)​ - RELEASED IN OCTOBER 2020
  • Spa-Francorchamps Pack featuring 1970, 1993, 2020 versions (individually this will sell for US$ 9.99 / €8.99)​ - RELEASED IN DECEMBER 2020
  • At least two more Track DLCs in the same mould of the ones above ( US$ 9.99 / €8.99 each)​

Furthermore, this Season Pass covers all Expansion Packs and other Car & Track packages to be released in the 2020-2022 timeframe - these are packs currently confirmed, arranged to a certain theme, featuring cars, tracks or both, with base prices ranging from US$ 9.99 - US$ 19.99:

  • Historical Track Pack - Pack featuring historical variants of tracks featuring in the game
  • Street Supercars - Pack of road-legal Supercars
  • Racin´ USA - Pack featuring several North American cars and tracks, modern and historical

name: Automobilista 2 2020-2022 Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 (+ specific versions of 7)
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i5 3450 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX680 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700K / AMD Ryzen7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1080Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: This Season Pass covers all planned DLC packs planned for Automobilista 2 over 2020 & 2022 - includes 6 Premium Race Tracks with multiple versions, 3 major Expansion Packs with several cars and tracks as well as other minor car or track packs.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
